evidence.text:
RAY: Who the fuck is this?
RAY: Oh, really? Well, I'm her husband.
MADISON: Ray, can we just keep it --
RAY: Keep it what, Maddy? You tell me. You tell me, Maddy. You want me to keep it cordial?
RAY: Yeah, you too, boyfriend! Madison, you're pathetic!

RAY: Goddamn it, Madison. Don't walk away from me. DON'T YOU FUCKING
MADISON: He said apologize, motherfucker. He's a professional, he'll do it. Show him.
RAY: Professional what? Professional asshole. Really moving up in the world, aren't you, Madison? See you again, professional.
